easy.description: During a college fest, the canteen cashbox goes missing after closing time.
easy.initial_clue: Guard Nisha saw someone in a red hoodie running toward Parking B around 20:15.

easy.description: A high-end microscope disappears from Lab 203 after hours.
easy.initial_clue: Security email shows an after-hours door swipe at 22:12.

easy.description: The sacred Ganesh idol is stolen from a Mumbai temple shrine overnight.
easy.initial_clue: Witness Chaiwala Ram saw a white Maruti Swift speeding away at midnight.

easy.description: A saree boutique is broken into at night; priceless silk sarees go missing.
easy.initial_clue: Fruit seller Lakshmi heard glass shatter and saw a uniformed figure dash away.

easy.description: A family’s heirloom jewelry box disappears from their Pune bungalow.
easy.initial_clue: Housemaid Seema saw footprints leading from the garden to the servant quarters.

easy.description: A signed cricket bat disappears from the Wankhede locker room after a night match.
easy.initial_clue: Security guard Ajit saw a man in a VIP jersey slip into the locker area.

easy.description: A rare manuscript is stolen from the Delhi Public Library’s restricted section.
easy.initial_clue: Librarian Meera noticed the manuscript missing during morning inventory.

easy.description: Confidential board exam papers are leaked from the education office.
easy.initial_clue: Clerk Rajesh found torn paper bits near the copier.

easy.description: Coins vanish from a locked donation box at a Chennai temple during the festival.
easy.initial_clue: Priest Ranganathan found the box unlocked with mud smudges around.

easy.description: An antique Mughal-era painting is stolen from a special exhibit at the Red Fort.
easy.initial_clue: Security guard Arjun heard a glass case click open at 3 AM.

easy.description: A delivery person’s signature tiffin is reported missing in a busy neighborhood.
easy.initial_clue: Shopkeeper Mehul saw a stray dog dragging a tiffin outside the shop.

easy.description: Packets of chips vanish from the college canteen counter during the lunch rush.
easy.initial_clue: Cashier notes someone with an oversized backpack loitering by the display.

easy.description: A wallet is reported missing from a canteen bench.
easy.initial_clue: Friend noticed someone leaving the bench in a hurry after lunch.
